alert.note: Alert for Elliott; Menifee; Morgan; Rowan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 25 at 3:48PM EDT until August 25 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in JACKSON KY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Morgan County in southeastern Kentucky... East central Menifee County in east central Kentucky... South central Rowan County in east central Kentucky... Southwestern Elliott County in east central Kentucky... * Until 415 PM EDT. * At 348 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Blaze, or 9 miles northwest of West Liberty, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Pomp around 400 PM EDT. West Liberty around 405 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Lenox and Elamton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
